name: truDigital Signage
tag_list: trudigital, trudigital-signage, trudigital-corporation, digital-signage, cloud-based, cost-effective, easy-to-use, affordable, digital-menu-board, digital-menu-boards, digital-sign, digital-signs
overview: truDigital provides a full service digital signage solution. The company focuses on offering a cloud-based platform that creates, manages, and distributes electronic content to networks of digital displays that are centrally managed and addressable for targeted information, entertainment, merchandising, and advertising. Their premier cloud-based solution, manages the transmission of multimedia content to various digital signage displays from an Internet-connected device, also known as a Digital Network Device (DND). Their application is accessible from any Internet-connected device in the world, no software or licensing required. In addition, truDigital offers services, such as training, content and technical services, and broadcast multimedia services. truDigital serves industries such as the automotive, banks, corporate, government, education, supermarkets, hospitality, transportation, healthcare, entertainment, and retail. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Sandy, Utah.
